record.title: LEGISLATIVE SESSION
record.chair: The Senate will resume legislative session.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant journal clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The clerk will continue the call of the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk continued with the call of the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
